name: Pacific Gas & Electric Company PG&E
description: Pacific Gas & Electric Company PG&E is the primary electricity provider in San Jose, responsible for delivering safe and reliable energy services to residential and business customers.
emergency_steps:
- Stay at least 35 feet away from any fallen power lines and anything they are touching.  
- Use battery-operated flashlights instead of candles to prevent fire hazards.  
- Unplug or turn off all electric and heat-producing appliances to prevent damage when power is restored.  
- Use a cell phone or hard-wired phone, as cordless phones do not work without electricity.  
- Avoid entering flooded areas or using electrical equipment that may have been submerged.  

Non-Emergency Tips:  
- Secure helium-filled metallic balloons with weights to prevent them from floating into powerlines, which can cause outages and fires pge.com.  
- Sign up for power shutoff notifications to stay informed about potential outages pge.com.
